name: Milkyway VR
description:
Description

Take control of godly cheese coated pinchers in this ridiculously chaotic world and work together with the brave Donut Trooper Task Force to build turrets, and guide the citizens to safety through the Cocoa Milk Express. 

Each Donut Trooper comes with a special ability! Mix and match them to transform the turrets into powerful structures to fight the curse of the zombies.

Power-Up Your Houses

Place Donut Trooper Citizens inside your Turret Houses in order to give them special abilities! Each Trooper comes with their own unique power!

Tie Up & Toss Zombies

Tie up and toss away rabid zombies to safeguard your turrets and trains!

Unleash Your Cheesy Abilities

Mix and Match different troopers inside the turrets to unlock heavenly abilities.

Controls

Joystick (Left or Right) - Move around
Trigger (Left or Right) - Grab/Release Objects
Left + Right Grip - Calibrate 

Developer Notes

This game prototype has only been tested on the Meta Quest 2, HTC Vive Pro 2, and HTC Vive. However, the game is configured for all VR headsets. 

Contact us at hello@thousandstarsstudio.com to report bugs, feedback or if the game isn't working on your device.

IMPORTANT: Please have at least 3-4 feet of clear space around you while playing

Comfort Level: Comfortable
